name: Corrupted Guardian
resistance: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Disabling Strikes
traits.desc: The guardian's weapons are magical. When the guardian hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or the next weapon or spell attack it makes is made at disadvantage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian makes three melee attacks: two with its flail and one with its shield crush.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or the next weapon or spell attack it makes is made at disadvantage.

actions.name: Shield Crush
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet and knocked prone.

actions.name: Rapid Assault (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The guardian makes four flail attacks against a single target with disadvantage.

actions.name: Shield Wall (2/Day)
actions.desc: The guardian raises its shield and projects an ethereal barrier of energy against a ranged spell or weapon attack that it can see. That attack deals no damage. This ability does not work on spells of 5th level or higher.
